SmartFieldSpec.Name: Number of Sri Lanka Financial Sponsorships Smart Field
SmartFieldSpec.Description: This is a temporary query for the Sri Lanka Closure
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_NUMBEROFLKFINANCIALSPONSORSHIPSFORCONSTITUENT ( @ASOF datetime ) as -- write sql to calculate the smart field values based on the parameters and ASOF date
select distinct [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT].[ID] as CONSTITUENTID, count([V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor\Sponsorships\Sponsorship Opportunity].[LOOKUPID]) as [COUNT(Sponsor\Sponsorships\Sponsorship Opportunity\Lookup ID)]
from [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT] as [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT] left outer join [V_QUERY_SPONSOR] as [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor] on [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT].[ID] = [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor].[ID] inner join [V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIP] as [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor\Sponsorships] on [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor].[ID] = [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor\Sponsorships].[CONSTITUENTID] left outer join [V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY] as [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor\Sponsorships\Sponsorship Opportunity] on [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor\Sponsorships].[SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID] = [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor\Sponsorships\Sponsorship Opportunity].[ID] inner join [V_QUERY_SPONSORSHIPLOCATION] as [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor\Sponsorships\Sponsorship Opportunity\Opportunity Location] on [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor\Sponsorships\Sponsorship Opportunity].[SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID] = [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor\Sponsorships\Sponsorship Opportunity\Opportunity Location].[ID] left outer join [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT] as [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor\Sponsorships\Financial sponsor] on [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor\Sponsorships].[FINANCIALSPONSOR] = [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor\Sponsorships\Financial sponsor].[ID]
where [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor\Sponsorships].[STATUS] in (N'Active', N'Active (Transfer pending)', N'Active (Reassigned)') and [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor\Sponsorships\Sponsorship Opportunity\Opportunity Location].[LOOKUPID] like 'LK%' and ([V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor\Sponsorships\Financial sponsor].[LOOKUPID] is not null and [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT\Sponsor\Sponsorships\Financial sponsor].[LOOKUPID] <> '')
group by [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT].[ID]
